posts.post_title: FS:  T210-3 Old Mill Red Borders--3 different All Sold
posts.post_content:
All prices are net to me, either Paypal Friends and Family or Paypal Goods and Services--add 2.9%.  Shipping is on me.  An "I'll take it" trumps any on-going negotiations.
These cards are all sold.
Evans (Dallas) $45
Cowan (Shreveport) $68.50
Williams (Waco) $62
